item.title: Two oral presentations at EACL 2024
item.description: I presented our papers “Text-Guided Image Clustering” and “Counterfactual Reasoning with Knowledge Graph Embeddings” at EACL 2024.

item.title: Short paper accepted at "The Web Conference"
item.description: Our paper “The Impact of Cluster Centroid and Text Review Embeddings on Recommendation Methods” was accepted as a short paper at The Web Conference.

item.title: Research stay at the Schütze lab at LMU in Munich, Germany.
item.description: In February i stayed for a month at the lab by Hinrich Schütze at the The Center for Information and Language Processing (CIS) at LMU Munich.

item.title: Invited talk at the Munich NLP meetup [Group](Invited talk at the Munich NLP meetup Group)
item.description: I gave an invited talk at the Munich NLP meetup Group about our paper “Text-Guided Image Clustering”.

item.title: Paper accepted at EMNLP 2023
item.description: Our paper “Seeing through the mess: evolutionary dynamics of lexical polysemy” was accepted at EMNLP2023.

item.title: Weak Supervision Tutorial at Aalborg University Copenhagen, Denmark
item.description: We gave a Tutorial on Weak Supervision at Aalborg University Copenhagen, Denmark. Find the material on Github.

item.title: ACL 2023 Theme Paper Special Award
item.description: Our ACL 2023 paper “Weaker Than You Think: A Critical Look at Weakly Supervised Learning”, together with Dawei Zhu, Xiaoyu Shen, Marius Mosbach, Andreas Stephan and Dietrich Klakow won the ACL 2023 Theme Paper Special Award.

item.title: Invited talk at Snorkel ML
item.description: Snorkel ML Research Talk: Weak Supervision at the University of Vienna

item.title: Talk at VW Data labs
item.description: I gave a talk at VW data labs, we discussed the progress of LLM’s and it’s implications on research and industry.
